subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: BALTIMORE — As soon as Mark Teixeira stepped from the Yankees’ dugout before Monday’s game, the fans at Camden Yards let him know this was not home sweet home. A native of Severna Park, Md., Teixeira signed an eight-year, $180 million contract with the Yankees last winter, rejecting an offer from the Orioles for less money and fewer years. Predictably, he was jeered as a sellout.
